questions.question: The elephant is the world’s largest mammal.
questions.comment: The blue whale is.

questions.question: Sea otters sometimes hold hands while they sleep.
Centipedes have more legs than any other animal.
questions.comment: Millipedes can have more.

questions.question: Mammals and dinosaurs coexisted.
questions.comment: Mammals have been around for 200 million years. The dinosaurs went extinct 65 million years ago..

questions.question: Bears can’t climb trees.
Camels store water in their humps.
questions.comment: It's fat.

questions.question: Flamingos are pink because they eat shrimp.
The giant panda eats mostly bamboo.
The platypus is the only mammal that lays eggs.
questions.comment: The echidna is the other.

questions.question: A mule is a cross between a male donkey and a female horse.

questions.comment: Confucius was born in 550 BCE while Julius Caesar was born in 100 BCE.
Gandhi was born in 1869 while Fidel was born in 1926.
Mandela was born in 1918 while Anne Frank was born in 1929.
Cleopatra was born in 69 BCE while Muhammad was born circa 570 CE.
Joan of Arc was born circa 1412 while Shakespeare was born in 1564.
Sun Tzu was born in 544 BCE while Washington was born in 1732 CE.
Genghis Khan was born circa 1160 while da Vinci was born in 1452.
Marx was born in 1818 while Queen Victoria was born in 1819.
Marilyn Monroe was born in 1926 while Saddam Hussein was born in 1937.
Einstein was born in 1879 while Mao was born in 1893.

title: Which had the higher population in 2019?

questions.comment: Germany had 84 million while France had 65 million.
Japan had 127 million while South Korea had 51 million.
Brazil had 211 million while Argentina had 45 million.
Egypt had 100 million while Botswana had 2 million.
Mexico had 128 million while Guatemala had 18 million.
Panama had 4 million while Belize had 390 thousand.
Haiti had 11 million while Jamaica had 3 million.
Greece had 10 million while Norway had 5 million.
China had 1.43 billion while India had 1.37 billion.
Iran had 83 million while Iraq had 39 million.

questions.question: Mars has one moon just like earth.
questions.comment: Mars has two moons.

questions.question: Scurvy is caused by vitamin C deficiency.
Brass is made from iron and copper.
questions.comment: Zinc and copper.

questions.question: One tablespoon of oil has more calories than one tablespoon of butter.
questions.comment: A tablespoon of oil has 120 calories while a tablespoon of butter has 110.

questions.question: Helium is the lightest element.
questions.comment: Hydrogen.

questions.question: The common cold is caused by bacteria.
questions.comment: Viruses.

questions.question: The deepest place on Earth is in the Pacific.
Seasons are caused by the Earth's elliptical orbit around the Sun.
questions.comment: They're because the earth's axis has a tilt.

questions.question: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
Atoms in a solid are more densely packed than in a gas.
